text: Charles Lewis "Chuck" Low (July 21, 1928 â€“ September 18, 2017) was an American actor. He was born in New York City, New York. He was known for his role as Morris "Morrie" Kessler in the Martin Scorsese movie Goodfellas (1990). He has had small roles in other Robert De Niro movies, such as The Mission, The King of Comedy, and most notably in Sergio Leone's 1984 movie Once Upon a Time in America.
